metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: PHP is a server scripting language, and a powerful tool for making dynamic and interactive Web pages.
content.html: PHP is a server scripting language, and a powerful tool for making dynamic and interactive Web pages.

content.text: PHP is a widely-used, free, and efficient alternative to competitors such as Microsoft's ASP.
content.html: PHP is a widely-used, free, and efficient alternative to competitors such as Microsoft's ASP.

content.text: With our online "PHP Tryit" editor, you can edit the PHP code, and click on a button to view the result.
content.html: With our online "PHP Tryit" editor, you can edit the PHP code, and click on a button to view the result.

<!
DOCTYPE

html
>


<
html
>


<
body
>



<?php

"My first PHP script!"
;

</
body
>


</
html
>
content.code_html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
 
<?php
echo "My first PHP script!";
?>

</body>
</html>

content.text: Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.
content.html: Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.

content.text: Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.
content.html: Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.

content.text: Learn by examples! This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying examples.
content.html: Learn by examples! This tutorial supplements all explanations with clarifying examples.

content.text: Learn by taking a quiz! This quiz will give you a signal of how much you know, or do not know, about PHP.
content.html: Learn by taking a quiz! This quiz will give you a signal of how much you know, or do not know, about PHP.
